mapper.insert: insert into RESERVE (RESERVE_SEQ, STORE_NUM, ID, RESERVE_NAME, RES_DATE, PHONE) values (RESERVE_SEQ.nextval, #{storeNum}, #{id}, #{reserveName}, TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from RESERVE where ID=#{memberID} and RES_DATE >= (select SYSDATE from dual) order by RES_DATE desc
select * from RESERVE where ID=#{memberID} and (select SYSDATE from dual) > RES_DATE order by RES_DATE desc
select * from STORE where STORE_NUM IN (select STORE_NUM from RESERVE where ID=#{memberID})
